alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:25PM EDT until June 26 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cortland County in central New York... Southeastern Onondaga County in central New York... Northeastern Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 825 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Otisco to Harford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cortland, Pompey, Homer, Otisco, Virgil, Preble, Scott, Truxton, Solon and Cincinnatus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
